Exam Scheduling Benchmarks

Distributional MIPLIB benchmarks for IP-ML research.

Overview

A comprehensive benchmarking suite for exam scheduling problems, providing standardized test cases for Integer Programming and Machine Learning research. This work contributes to MIPLIB with realistic, diverse problem instances.

Status

In submission to MIPLIB

Authors

T. Ye, A. Jovine

Technologies
